module.exports = {
      entry: [
        './src/index.js'
      ],
      output: {
        path: __dirname,
        publicPath: '/',
        filename: 'bundle.js'
      },
      module: {
        loaders: [{
          exclude: /node_modules/,
          loader: 'babel',
          query: {
            presets: ['react', 'es2015', 'stage-1']
          }
        }]
      },
      resolve: {
        extensions: ['', '.js', '.jsx']
      },
      devServer: {
        historyApiFallback: true,
        contentBase: './'
      }
    };
